WorkItem.ClosedComment: 4.1.05 Released. If this is still an issue, please reopen with exact steps to reproduce and any necessary character files
WorkItem.Description: I was wondering why i had only 18 expertise when importing my char from armory and found the reason:  The new version of Rawr does not import the talents - so all values are with 0/41 talents.
WorkItem.Summary: [LoadCharacter] Rawr is not importing the talents for Enhance

Comments.Message: Is it that it's not importing the talents or that you opened a saved file from a previous version and the talents got wiped out?

I don't mean to "hi-jack" this thread so I apologize if I should have started my own thread but I noticed the title and wanted to note that I have a similar problem with the Rawr add-on just in case it helps somehow.  It will import most of the talent points correctly but may misplace a couple or not apply some at all so I end up with something like "Custom (3 talent pts remaining)" or something like that.  Sometimes it even applies too many and I end up with a "Custom (2 points over)" tree.  (mage)

Hmm. Now I know whats wrong. My issue got closed (http://rawr.codeplex.com/workitem/20626) because there were not talents. But i've imported my character from battle.net like I always do. Indeed, no talents selected after import. You have to manually select them.

I Installed the new version 4.1.04 of rawr and downloaded the char data from battle.net. Like I did with all Rawr versions before.  
I tried it several times, but no talents after the import. 
But it is possible to set them manually (and after that the values are ok). 

PS: Just tried to open a saved char (saved with previous Rawr version in April) , its the same - no talents after opening the char.

OH! OH! OH! oh ... dammit

I didn't update the server with a new build that would understand 4.1.0 talent trees :/

I'll update it soon
Updated, is this still happening now?
Talents are now being downloaded correctly in the Silverlight version posted on EJ (for my file at least).
